main-arguments.subject: Individual or patient involved in the medical event.
main-arguments.treatment: What is the therapy administered to the patients?
main-arguments.effect: What are the outcomes or side effects of the treatments?

subject.subject-age: What is the age of the subject?
subject.subject-gender: What is the Gender of the subject?
subject.subject-population: Number of patients receiving the treatment.
subject.subject-race: What is the Race/nationality of the subject?
subject.subject-disorder: What are the preexisting conditions, i.e., disorders that the subject suffers other than the target disorder of the treatment?

treatment.treatment-drug: Whare the the drugs used as therapy in the event?
treatment.treatment-dosage: What is the amount of drug is given?
treatment.treatment-route: What is the route of drug administration?
treatment.treatment-time_elapsed: How much time elapsed after the drug was administered to the occurrence of the (side) effect?
treatment.treatment-duration: How long the patient has been taking the medicine (usually for long-term medication)?
treatment.treatment-disorder: What is the target disorder of the medicine administration?
